entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @LindseyGrahamSC @seanhannity Bitching about nurses making an outrageous $24/hr on unemployment makes you not only despicable, but also stupid, because #nurses aren't among the unemployed! #COVID19 #COVIDIDIOT #coronavirus #Moronavirus @GOP @GOPLeader @senatemajldr @SRCC @realDonaldTrump @IvankaTrump @FoxNews
